attributes.action: Leave or stay.It will be better than Brown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As probably, in a historical context this PM is the worst this country has suffered,having destroyed in no time many of our institutions and created a morally bankrupt state dependant unsustainable society whether he leaves or not will make no difference

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
